Module com.lmax.solana4j.client
Package com.lmax.solana4j.client.api

Interface SolanaApi

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SolanaJsonRpcClient
    public interface SolanaApi
    Represents the API for interacting with a solana node.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      SolanaClientResponse<AccountInfo> getAccountInfo​(java.lang.String address)
      Returns the account information at the specified address with default optional parameters.

    • Method Detail

      • sendTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> sendTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionBlob)
                                                throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Sends a transaction to the blockchain with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transactionBlob - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the signature of the transaction as a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • sendTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> sendTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionBlob,
                                                       SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Sends a transaction to the blockchain with optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transactionBlob - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `skipPreflight`, `preflightCommitment`, `maxRetries`, `encoding` and `minContextSlot`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the signature of the transaction as a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<TransactionResponse> getTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionSignature)
                                                  throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Returns the transaction response for a given transaction signature with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transactionSignature - the base58-encoded signature of the transaction
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the TransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<TransactionResponse> getTransaction​(java.lang.String transactionSignature,
                                                         SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                  throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Returns the transaction response for a given transaction signature with optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transactionSignature - the base58-encoded signature of the transaction
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request such as `commitment`, `maxSupportedTransactionVersion` and `encoding`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the TransactionResponse
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • requestAirdrop

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> requestAirdrop​(java.lang.String address,
                                                      long amountLamports)
                                               throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Requests an airdrop of lamports to the specified address with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        address - the base58-encoded public key of the recipient account
        amountLamports - the amount of lamports to be airdropped
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the transaction signature as a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • requestAirdrop

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.String> requestAirdrop​(java.lang.String address,
                                                      long amountLamports,
                                                      SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                               throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Requests an airdrop of lamports to the specified address with optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        address - the base58-encoded public key of the recipient account
        amountLamports - the amount of lamports to be airdropped
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `commitment`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the transaction signature as a base58-encoded string
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.Long> getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption​(int size)
                                                                throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Returns the minimum balance required for rent exemption for an account of the given size, with default optional parameters. This is the minimum balance needed to ensure the account is rent-exempt.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the account in bytes
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the minimum balance in lamports for rent exemption
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption

        SolanaClientResponse<java.lang.Long> getMinimumBalanceForRentExemption​(int size,
                                                                       SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                                throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Returns the minimum balance required for rent exemption for an account of the given size, with optional parameters. This is the minimum balance needed to ensure the account is rent-exempt.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the account in bytes
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `commitment`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing the minimum balance in lamports for rent exemption
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getSignaturesForAddress

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<SignatureForAddress>> getSignaturesForAddress​(java.lang.String address)
                                                                           throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Returns a list of transaction signatures for the specified address, with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        address - the base58-encoded public key of the address
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of SignatureForAddress objects enumerating signatures relating to the address
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getSignaturesForAddress

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<SignatureForAddress>> getSignaturesForAddress​(java.lang.String address,
                                                                                  SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                                           throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieves a list of transaction signatures for a specified address, with optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        address - the base58-encoded public key of the address
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `commitment`, `minContextSlot`, `limit` `before` and `until`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of SignatureForAddress objects enumerating signatures relating to the address
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getSignatureStatuses

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<SignatureStatus>> getSignatureStatuses​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> transactionSignatures)
                                                                    throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieves the statuses of one or more transaction signatures, with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transactionSignatures - a list of base58-encoded transaction signatures.
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of SignatureStatus objects detailing the signature statuses
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getSignatureStatuses

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<SignatureStatus>> getSignatureStatuses​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> transactionSignatures,
                                                                           SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                                    throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieves the statuses of one or more transaction signatures, with optional parameters. Allows for additional filters or customizations when querying transaction statuses.
        Parameters:
        transactionSignatures - a list of base58-encoded transaction signatures.
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `searchTransactionHistory`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of SignatureStatus objects detailing the signature statuses
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getTokenAccountsByOwner

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<TokenAccount>> getTokenAccountsByOwner​(java.lang.String accountDelegate,
                                                                           java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> filter)
                                                                    throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieves token accounts owned by a specific address, filtered by the token mint or program id, with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        accountDelegate - the base58-encoded public key of the account owner
        filter - a key-value pair specifying the filter criteria (e.g., token mint or program id)
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of TokenAccount objects representing token accounts
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getTokenAccountsByOwner

        SolanaClientResponse<java.util.List<TokenAccount>> getTokenAccountsByOwner​(java.lang.String accountDelegate,
                                                                           java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> filter,
                                                                           SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                                    throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieves token accounts owned by a specific address, filtered by the token mint or program id, with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        accountDelegate - the base58-encoded public key of the account owner.
        filter - a key-value pair specifying the filter criteria (e.g., token mint or program id)
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `commitment`, `minContextSlot` and `dataSlice`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a list of TokenAccount objects representing token accounts
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • simulateTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<SimulateTransactionResponse> simulateTransaction​(java.lang.String transaction)
                                                               throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Simulates a transaction without broadcasting it to the blockchain, with default optional parameters.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a SimulateTransactionResponse object with details of the simulation
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • simulateTransaction

        SolanaClientResponse<SimulateTransactionResponse> simulateTransaction​(java.lang.String transaction,
                                                                      SolanaClientOptionalParams optionalParams)
                                                               throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Simulates a transaction without broadcasting it to the blockchain, with optional parameters. This allows for additional customizations, such as setting the commitment level or enabling signature verification.
        Parameters:
        transaction - the base64-encoded string representing the transaction
        optionalParams - a map of optional parameters to customize the request, such as `commitment`, `sigVerify`, `replaceRecentBlockhash`, `minContextSlot`, `encoding`, `innerInstructions` and `accounts`
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a SimulateTransactionResponse object with details of the simulation
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request

      • getVersion

        SolanaClientResponse<SolanaVersion> getVersion()
                                        throws SolanaJsonRpcClientException
        Retrieve the current version of Solana Core and supported Feature Set from the node.
        Returns:
        a SolanaClientResponse containing a SimulateTransactionResponse object with the version and feature set
        Throws:
        SolanaJsonRpcClientException - if there is an error with the JSON-RPC request
